title: Person of Interest:  Reese VS US Marshall (II)
author: POI Fights
comment:
Scumbag: It’ll never be over.
Reese: It is for you.

Working with Finch, and dealing with his demons of his past, Reese stopped killing the way he had.
I've known women in that situation. I wish I had Reese's training. Or his number.
The actress who pays the abused housewife in this episode played Mercedes in The Count of Monte Cristo. I’ll bet she was cast in Person of Interest for the novelty of it.
I remember watching this episode and thinking wait a minute, and yes, the movie was fantastic
Way to Go Mr. Reese. A true hero.
description: Fight Scene from S01 X 21: Many Happy Returns
